## Welcome to our Beautiful Country!

```{r}
library(leaflet)

HPJIcon <- makeIcon(
        iconUrl = "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/67/Shanghai_121.45796E_31.22234N.jpg", 
        iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31, 
        iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16)

river <- leaflet() %>% 
        addTiles() %>% 
        addMarkers(lng = 121.504175, lat = 31.222934, 
                   popup = "Welcome to HPJ", icon = HPJIcon)
        
river
```
